meanings.definition: The mystical interpretation of the Hebrew scriptures.
meanings.sent1: Studying qabalas helps me understand the hidden meanings in the Bible.
meanings.sent2: Scholars delve into qabalas to uncover the deeper significance of ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends found humor in trying to decipher the secrets of qabalas.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a labyrinth of qabalas, each verse a new twist in the maze of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The teacher made qabalas come alive by revealing the spiritual essence within the words.

meanings.definition: The esoteric or mystical teachings of certain Jewish rabbis.
meanings.sent1: The students gathered to learn the profound wisdom of qabalas from the rabbi.
meanings.sent2: Ancient texts hold the key to understanding the enigmatic teachings of qabalas.
meanings.sent3: In a playful mood, they pretended to speak in cryptic qabalas code.
meanings.sent4: His words were like echoes of qabalas, resonating with hidden truths.
meanings.sent5: The aura of mystery surrounded the room as they delved into the depths of qabalas.
